Date: 2024-10-12 12:46
Subject: Editor’s Pick: Rubber-Soled Loafers Are In
--------------------------------------------------
Forsa leads the way. Over 250 Brands | Free Shipping | 30-Day Returns

 


Over 250 Brands  |  Free Shipping  |  30-Day Returns

 <https://d15k2d11r6t6rl.cloudfront.net/public/users/Integrators/f7683d20-2948-460f-8f91-a13fe519b593/DG8C7MD8WMMGLF592V8XZWA0/New%20Template%20Features/level_logo_en.jpg> 
 	

NEW IN         MEN         WOMEN         KIDS

 <https://d15k2d11r6t6rl.cloudfront.net/pub/trsn/kq3bm309/v0f/3x4/z8l/FORSASaturday-Men%20Main%20banner.jpg> 

Rubber-soled loafers have been going hard since the summer. Forsa’s lightweight, suede loafers are pitch-perfect examples of the trend, so it’s been no surpise that they’ve been selling fast since they launched. Snap them up before sizes run out.
